First 37 minutes were good quality, besides the WB logo in the middle of the screen that was slightly visible through it- but more visible in darker scenes.

The rest of the movie was blurry, dark, and the audio was a bit off at times.

NOT RECOMMENDED IF YOU HAVE NOT SEEN IT IN THE THEATER YET. 

Other than that it was watchable if you have seen it in theaters and just really need to watch it again. However there is this annoying blurred spot on the lower right hand of the screen that looks like some sort of clock or counter.
